capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator now. That's a big responsibility, but I'm feeling pretty confident about it. It's official, I've been given the title of administrator - that's a confirmation of my new role.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what institution is filch affiliated with?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and I found out that Filch has an affiliation with the Hog's Head pub. Apparently, he's quite close to the place.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. filch, who is the person that looks at something?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact I can confirm with certainty.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never met anyone as young as you, valeria   an 11 year old is really quite young!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and I think it's a fact that she's still in elementary school at this age.
capsules_submitted.reply: i like it! so hermione and ron are both eleven years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old, you know. I think it's pretty cool that he's still so young and full of energy. (CERTAINTY: high POLARITY: positive SENTIMENT: neutral EMOTION: enthusiasm)
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of ron before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it turns out that his lineage is quite interesting. Apparently, he had a condition called maculogy which affects the size of the pupils. I'm pretty sure this information is accurate, so I'd say I'm fairly certain about it. It's not like I'm speculating or anything, I've got some solid facts to back it up.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of talents does maculogy have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've always found his... unique approach to teaching quite fascinating, and his expertise in potions is unparalleled.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult, and I've had my fair share of dealing with his... let's say, "mature" demeanor. He's a complex character, to say the least.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Snape's family history and it turns out he has a pretty complicated lineage. Apparently, his mother was a witch and his father was a Muggle, which makes him a half-blood wizard. But what's really interesting is that his parents were both part of the Death Eaters, which makes Snape's own allegiance to the Dark Lord even more complex. I'm fairly certain about this information, it seems pretty well-documented in the books.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of person is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's belongings include a wand. I'm quite certain about that, and I'd say it's a fact that's pretty clear-cut.
